title: low priority is just dumb
body:
This is just stupid crap that riot thinks its good. My pc crashed for 10 mins and now I have to wait 5x20 mins because your iq is 0 ty rito. 
You are starting to ruin this game piece by piece.

replies.body:
That does really suck that you keep having these crashes and can't seem to play normally, but this almost must have happened over and over again for you to end up with that kind of LPQ. It's always good to to your troubleshooting in customs or practice matches to be sure you avoid these types of things!!

First I'd start with the general repair in the client options, and test it in practice. If that's still crashing, it'd be worth your time to run through the other steps listed in the [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as well. Again, make sure you're testing these steps in custom or practice before jumping back into live matches where you may crash again.

Actually, you leaving games because of your computer issues is ruining games. Itâ€™s your responsibility to keep your computer up to par for running League without crashes - and this means ensuring you have the specs as well as ensuring you give League the time to update without interruption.
